snippet: In a four-page ruling, Judge Gladys Kessler rejected a request by a detainee to bar the military from force-feeding him, but the judge made an appeal to President Obama to address the issue.
abstract: Federal Judge Gladys Kessler rejects request by Guantanamo Bay detainee Jihad Ahmed Mujstafa Diyab to bar the military from force-feeding him, but makes an appeal to Pres Obama to address issue.
lead_paragraph: In a four-page ruling, Judge Gladys Kessler rejected a request by a detainee to bar the military from force-feeding him, but the judge made an appeal to President Obama to address the issue.

headline.main: Judge Urges President to Address Prison Strike
headline.print_headline: Judge Urges President To Address Prison Strike
